title: Final Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom Trailer Reactions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.13.23
description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Blessing and Tim react to the new Zelda trailer, talk about an upcoming Street Fighter showcase, and discuss a new upcoming game, Stray Gods.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:07 - Housekeeping
A new Xcast is up with Mike, Gary, and Parris breaking down their reactions to Redfall releasing at only 30FPS. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
This Friday, April 14th, Kinda Funny is teaming up with our friends at Hang Time for an awesome stream where we'll channel our inner "DOM Toretto" and race across the states in The Crew 2!
We’re trying something new with YouTube SuperChats on Kinda Funny Games Daily! ONLY on YouTube and the livestream, there’s going to be a 30-minute post-show where SnowBikeMike comes in to talk to US KFGD hosts about YOUR Superchat questions!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:27 - Nintendo’s put out the FINAL Zelda Tears of The Kingdom trailer
00:28:35 - Lil Wayne is hosting the Street Fighter 6 Showcase
00:33:14 - Hidetaka Miyazaki named one of Time’s 100 most influential people of 2023
00:36:56 - Shuhei Yoshida is now a PlayStation Stars digital collectible
00:39:25 - The Super Mario Bros theme is the first game music selected for preservation in the Library of Congress
00:43:49 - Stray Gods is coming August 3rd and it looks dope as hell
00:49:12 - Out Today
00:53:01 - “You should check out Trinity Fusion” - Charles Jakobsen
00:54:57 - “I’ve been low-key obsessed with having destructible environments in my games…” - Chuck Diamond
01:00:37 - You‘re Wrong
01:02:49 - SuperChattin’ w/ KF
